title: Generate a follow-up email
description: This prompt helps you craft a polite and effective follow-up email to a prospect who hasn't responded to your initial outreach. It focuses on providing additional value and a clear call to action.
prompt: Write a follow-up email to a potential client who has not replied to my previous email sent a week ago. My goal is to re-engage them without being pushy. I am a marketing consultant and I previously offered a free audit of their website. My company is called [[Your Company Name]] and I am based in [[Your Location]].
output:
Subject: Following up - a quick thought on your website

Hi [Client Name],

I hope you are having a productive week.

I'm writing to follow up on the email I sent last week about a free website audit. I had a quick look at your site and noticed [mention one specific, easy-to-fix issue]. It's a common challenge, and there are a few simple ways to address it that could significantly boost your user engagement.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute chat next week to discuss this further? No strings attached.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
